thread.title: Your first cry at the Oscars is meeting one of the real-life ‘Hidden Figures’
thread.title_full: Your first cry at the Oscars is meeting one of the real-life ‘Hidden Figures’

author: Saba Hamedy
title: Your first cry at the Oscars is meeting one of the real-life ‘Hidden Figures’
text:
Your first cry at the Oscars is meeting one of the real-life ‘Hidden Figures’ 0 2017-02-27 02:35:47 UTC 
Sorry, "In memoriam" segment. 
One of the biggest tear-worthy moments of the Oscars on Sunday came early on in the night thanks to an appearance from one of the real-life Hidden Figures. The stars of 'Hidden Figures' welcome the real-life Katherine Johnson to the #Oscars pic.twitter.com/rGHKuCpg8m
